Package updatestrategy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    Interface for update strategy
    IUpdateStrategyFac<TDispMsg>
    An interface that defines a factory that instantiates a specific IUpdateStrategy
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlackholeStrategy
    The black hole that absorbs anything close to itself.
    BreathingStrategy
    A strategy that makes the ball changing in diameter
    BrownStrategy
    A simple class to simulate brownian motion
    ColorStrategy
    A strategy to set the ball to randomly changing colors.
    CurveStrategy
    The strategy that makes the ball move in curves.
    DrunkenStrategy
    Makes the ball moves like drunk.
    ElasticStrategy  
    IUpdateStrategy.NullFactory<TDispMsg>
    * A factory for a typed null strategy object.
    MultiUpdateStrategy<MultiCmd>
    The strategy that merge multiple strategies together.
    PoliceStrategy
    A police ball that slows down every ball around it
    SpawnStrategy
    The ball will produce a child of itself with the ball in its way, and make that ball bearable too
    SpeedingStrategy
    A SpeedingStrategy slowly increases the speed and then rapidly decreases the speed of balls that it is applied to
    StarStrategy
    A 'star' ball that sucks (think gravitational pull) all balls within that ball's radius and increase its area.
    StraightStrategy<IBallCmd>
    The regular.
    SwitcherStrategy
    The ball for later switch in behavior.
    TeleportOnCollideStrategy
    A ball that, on collisions with another ball, teleports both itself and the other ball
    WanderStrategy
    Makes the ball wander.
    WormholeStrategy
    A transport point in space, any ball hit RIGHT INTO THE CENTER will be transported to another random point with original speed (can only transport balls smaller than itself!!)
